name: Children of Morta

files.goginstaller: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
- mfplat_dll: https://lutris.net/files/tools/dll/mfplat/x64/mfplat.dll
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Children of Morta/ChildrenOfMorta.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mf
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mediafoundation
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mf_
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mfreadwrite
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: wmadmod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: wmvdecod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    description: Installing Children of Morta
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Children of Morta
    src: mfplat_dll
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
